name: A funky-looking mushroom hat
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a good amount.
It decreases the users wisdom poorly.
It decreases the users intelligence poorly.
It has little armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration poorly.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
